name: BigHit Idol Life Tutorial!
description:
Life is hard enough as it is now as an Idol you must struggle to balance Social Life and Business life. With 7 boys living across from you and living with your own group of 6 girls including yourself personal matters work their way into your business life. Will you have to give up your dream of being an idol for love? The other way around? Or will you be able to handle it all? 

Play the tutorial get a taste of what BigHit Idol life Is like.
